DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication that the subject has abstained from food/water for the specified amount of time.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC SDTM Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response Terminology
ReferenceDocuments.description: Terminology codelist used with Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response within the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Study Data Tabulation Model.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record whether the subject was fasting prior to the study treatment being taken.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECFAST
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable. Would only be populated when ECMOOD = "PERFORMED".

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Some study treatments may have a food effect and it is important to know whether the dose was taken while the subject was fasted.
